Class CreditCard

java.lang.Object
  CreditCard

public class CreditCard
extends java.lang.Object

CreditCard.java is a class implementing very simple credit cards.

See Also:

chargeIt

public boolean chargeIt(double price)
chargeIt() charges an amount to the balance of a credit card

Parameters:
price - The price to be charged to the credit card
Returns:
Returns true if the charge is under the card's credit limit and false if it goes over

applyInterest

public void applyInterest(double i)
applyInterest() applies a decimal interest rate to the balance of a credit card.

Parameters:
i - The decimal percentage of interest to be charged on the card's balance

makePayment

public void makePayment(double payment)
makePayment() makes a payment on the outstanding balance of the credit card and if the balance remains above $0, charges 10% interest

Parameters:
payment - The amount of the payment

printCard

public static void printCard(CreditCard c)
